properties.apiRevisionDescription: [v2.0.1] Add showerrors query parameter to existing report route. Validator Services [v2.4.8](https://github.com/IATI/validator-services/releases/tag/v2.4.8)
properties.description:
IATI Validation API. Provides routes related to the validation of IATI XML.

The API adheres to the [IATI Validator API Contract](https://cdn.iatistandard.org/prod-iati-website/documents/IATI_Validator_API_Contract.pdf).
